UN chief urges peaceful US protests, calls on leaders to listen, show restraint tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740754 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740754/un-chief-urges-peaceful-us-protests-calls-on-leaders-to-listen-show-restraint/story/ United Nations chief Antonio Guterres urges Americans protesting racial inequities and excessive police force to do so peacefully and calls on US leaders and authorities to listen to them and show restraint, UN spokesman Stephane Dujarric said on Monday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 06:19:37 +0800
Former US President Obama condemns violence at protests tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740752 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740752/former-us-president-obama-condemns-violence-at-protests/story/ Former US President Barack Obama on Monday condemned the use of violence at nationwide protests over racial inequities and excessive police force, while praising the actions of peaceful protesters seeking change. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 05:06:17 +0800
More than 6.2 million COVID-19 cases worldwide, death toll at 373,439 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740751 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740751/more-than-6-2-million-covid-19-cases-worldwide-death-toll-at-373-439/story/ The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic has killed 373,439 people worldwide while 6,220,110 cases have been registered in 196 countries and territories, according to an AFP tally on Monday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 04:49:33 +0800
Deaths from Storm Amanda rise to 20 in Central America tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740749 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740749/deaths-from-storm-amanda-rise-to-20-in-central-america/story/ Torrential rains at the weekend caused by Tropical Storm Amanda have killed at least 20 people in Central America, authorities said on Monday, as remnants of the weather front moved north into Mexico and threatened to form a new cyclone. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 04:21:32 +0800
Independent autopsy finds George Floyd died by strangulation tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740748 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740748/independent-autopsy-finds-george-floyd-died-by-strangulation/story/ Two doctors who carried out an independent autopsy of George Floyd, the African-American man whose death in Minneapolis police custody last week triggered nationwide protests, said on Monday that the cause of death was "mechanical asphyxia" and that his death was a homicide. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 03:53:33 +0800
WHO will decide on its hydroxychloroquine trial suspension in 24 hours tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740747 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740747/who-will-decide-on-its-hydroxychloroquine-trial-suspension-in-24-hours/story/ The World Health Organization (WHO) should have enough information in 24 hours to decide whether to continue suspending its trial of hydroxychloroquine for use against coronavirus, its chief scientist Soumya Swaminathan said on Monday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 03:38:13 +0800
1,500 families affected by fire in Barangay Addition Hills, Mandaluyong City tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740743 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/740743/1-500-families-affected-by-fire-in-barangay-addition-hills-mandaluyong-city/story/ About 1,500 families were affected by the fire that hit Barangay Hills in Mandaluyong city amid the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic on Monday, Bam Alegre reported on Saksi. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 01:46:20 +0800
GMA analyst Heydarian s take on the Anti-Terrorism Bill tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740741 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740741/gma-analyst-heydarian-s-take-on-the-anti-terrorism-bill/story/ “In short, hindi lang ito about acts of terrorism against innocent civilians, which is how terrorism is understood around the world, but also attacks on critical infrastructure and important public facilities… So medyo broad yung definition na ito,” Heydarian said. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 00:24:51 +0800
Doc Willie Ong, payag kayang pamunuan ang DOH o sumabak muli sa eleksyon? tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740740 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740740/doc-willie-ong-payag-kayang-pamunuan-ang-doh-o-sumabak-muli-sa-eleksyon/story/ Dahil sa COVID-19, marami ang natatakot na magtungo sa ospital para magpakonsulta kung may nararamdamang sakit kahit karaniwan lamang. Mabuti na lang at may mga duktor na "online" tulad ni Doc. Willie Ong na aktibo sa social media at handang magbigay ng payo. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 00:23:17 +0800
Duterte: PhilHealth reviewing new COVID-19 benefit package tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740738 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740738/duterte-philhealth-reviewing-new-covid-19-benefit-package/story/ A proposed update to the benefit package for COVID-19 testing has been submitted to the Philippine Health Insurance Corporation (PhilHealth) board for evaluation, President Rodrigo Duterte told Congress on Monday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 00:05:41 +0800
Persons linked to overpricing of medical equipment summoned by NBI - Duterte tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740737 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740737/persons-linked-to-overpricing-of-medical-equipment-summoned-by-nbi-duterte/story/ The National Bureau of Investigation (NBI) has begun its probe into allegations of overpricing in the government s planned purchase of medical equipment amid the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) crisis, President Rodrigo Duterte said Monday. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 00:03:50 +0800
1.7M senior citizens received social pension --Duterte tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740736 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/740736/1-7m-senior-citizens-received-social-pension-duterte/story/ In his weekly report, Duterte said 1,717,584 indigent senior citizens have received their social pension for the first half of 2020 and/or their unpaid pension for 2019, with a total cost of P5.15 billion. Tue, 02 Jun 2020 00:02:16 +0800
Pugante na natuto raw manggamot ng mga sakit kahit pa COVID-19, nadakip tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740735 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740735/pugante-na-natuto-raw-manggamot-ng-mga-sakit-kahit-pa-covid-19-nadakip/story/ Matapos ang halos dalawang taon na pagtatago, naaresto sa Las Piñas ang isang preso na tumakas sa isang kulungan sa Bacoor, Cavite. Ang suspek, naging manggagamot daw nang magtago sa lalawigan ng Quezon at kaya raw niyang magpagaling kahit ang mga tinamaan ng COVID-19. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 23:57:49 +0800
Congo declares new Ebola epidemic, 1,000 kms from eastern outbreak tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740732 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/world/740732/congo-declares-new-ebola-epidemic-1-000-kms-from-eastern-outbreak/story/ Democratic Republic of Congo declared a new Ebola epidemic on Monday in the western city of Mbandaka, more than 1,000 km (620 miles) away from an ongoing outbreak of the same deadly virus in the east. Mon, 01 Jun 2020 23:47:32 +0800
Lolo na tatlong oras naghintay ng masasakyan, hinimatay sa gilid ng kalsada tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-740729 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/740729/lolo-na-tatlong-oras-naghintay-ng-masasakyan-hinimatay-sa-gilid-ng-kalsada/story/ Isang matandang lalaki ang hinimatay sa Commonwealth Avenue, Litex Road sa Quezon City matapos ang matagal na paghihintay ng masasakyan nitong Lunes.
